contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 5, 1853 D Belle Vue Brass Band Contest
British Open 1 Test Piece Contest
british-open
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Two Own Choice Selections played by each band.
Prizes: 1st: £16 2nd: £6 3rd: £4 4th: £2
The draw above is not the original draw, but the order of play.
"The Mossley Band turned up too late to play in their original draw position, but were allowed to perform later." (Brass Bands, Arthur R. Taylor)
Jan. 25, 2011, 4:55 p.m. Feb. 25, 2012, 12:13 p.m.
1 Mossley Band William Taylor The Heavens are Telling [unknown arranger]
2 Dewsbury Band Squire Greenwood Lucrezia Borgia [arr. S. Greenwood]
3 Bramley Temperance M. Whitley The Heavens are Telling [unknown arranger]
4 Bury Borough Joseph Binns
Unknown Result Saddleworth & Haybottoms John Hamson
Unknown Result Newton Bank Print Works (Hyde) John Ainsworth
Unknown Result Nantwich Thomas Hassal
Unknown Result Woodside (Halifax) Jonathan Settle Tancredi - overture (unknown arranger)
